ingredients.item: 2 x 400g cans Cirio Tuscan Chopped Tomatoes

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan and fry the celery for 3–4 minutes until beginning to soften. Add the tomatoes, 300ml water, Worcestershire sauce, vodka (if using), celery salt and lemon juice.
Bring to the boil, then cover and reduce to a simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, and add the tabasco and salt and pepper to taste.
Using a blender or stick blender, blend the soup until completely smooth. Ladle into soup bowls or small coffee cups, with an extra grinding of pepper and a small lemon wedge.
